mean_en: the union of diverse things into one body or form or group; the growing together of parts
word_etyma: coalesc联合 + ence名词后缀 → coalescence 合并，凝聚
short_phrase: the coalescence of the team members
sentence: The coalescence of the team members filled us with confidence.
sentence_trans: 队员们的凝聚增加了我们的信心。
sentence_phrase: The coalescence of the team members
